meaningMnemonic: If there is <radical>dirt</radical> in a <radical>crab trap</radical>, it's a lot for the crabs to <kanji>endure</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You decide to make the little crab that <kanji>endure</kanji>d being stuck in a dirty crab trap your pet, and put a <reading>colla</reading>r (こら) round its little neck.
